subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks guard Iman Shumpert returned against Charlotte on Wednesday after missing 10 days, but left with a cramp in the fourth quarter as the Knicks lost to the Bobcats.
snippet: Knicks guard Iman Shumpert returned against Charlotte on Wednesday after missing 10 days, but left with a cramp in the fourth quarter as the Knicks lost to the Bobcats.
